alternativeNames: Granié, Étienne Marcelin; Sennen, Hermano; Granié-Blanc, Étienne Marcelin
notes: Hermano, Frère are not forenames but part of religious name, i.e. title
source: R.E.G. Pichi Sermolli 1 March 1991 from R.W.Kiger 11 July 1991. Bull Soc. Bot. France, 84:161-176 (1937), incl. bibliogr. Orchidophile, 124: 226-230 (1996). incl. portr.
